00058 /*      CA Status Code Definitions       */
00059 #define CA_K_INFO       3       /* successful */
00060 #define CA_K_ERROR      2       /* failed- continue */
00061 #define CA_K_SUCCESS    1       /* successful */
00062 #define CA_K_WARNING    0       /* unsuccessful */
00063 #define CA_K_SEVERE     4       /* failed- quit */
00064 #define CA_K_FATAL      CA_K_ERROR | CA_K_SEVERE
00065 #define CA_M_MSG_NO     0x0000FFF8
00066 #define CA_M_SEVERITY   0x00000007
00067 #define CA_M_LEVEL      0x00000003
00068 #define CA_M_SUCCESS    0x00000001
00069 #define CA_M_ERROR      0x00000002
00070 #define CA_M_SEVERE     0x00000004
00071 #define CA_S_MSG_NO     0x0D
00072 #define CA_S_SEVERITY   0x03
00073 #define CA_V_MSG_NO     0x03
00074 #define CA_V_SEVERITY   0x00
00075 #define CA_V_SUCCESS    0x00
00076 /* Define MACROS to extract/insert individual fields from a status value */
00077 #define CA_EXTRACT_MSG_NO(code)\
00078 ( ( (code) & CA_M_MSG_NO )      >> CA_V_MSG_NO )
00079 #define CA_EXTRACT_SEVERITY(code)\
00080 ( ( (code) & CA_M_SEVERITY )    >> CA_V_SEVERITY )
00081 #define CA_EXTRACT_SUCCESS(code)\
00082 ( ( (code) & CA_M_SUCCESS )     >> CA_V_SUCCESS )
00083 #define CA_INSERT_MSG_NO(code)\
00084 (       ((code)<< CA_V_MSG_NO)  & CA_M_MSG_NO   )
00085 #define CA_INSERT_SEVERITY(code)\
00086 (       ((code)<< CA_V_SEVERITY)& CA_M_SEVERITY )
00087 #define CA_INSERT_SUCCESS(code)\
00088 (       ((code)<< CA_V_SUCCESS) & CA_M_SUCCESS  )
00089 #define DEFMSG(SEVERITY,NUMBER)\
00090 (CA_INSERT_MSG_NO(NUMBER) | CA_INSERT_SEVERITY(SEVERITY))
00091 #define ECA_NORMAL      DEFMSG(CA_K_SUCCESS,    0)
00092 #define ECA_MAXIOC      DEFMSG(CA_K_ERROR,      1)
00093 #define ECA_UKNHOST     DEFMSG(CA_K_ERROR,      2)
00094 #define ECA_UKNSERV     DEFMSG(CA_K_ERROR,      3)
00095 #define ECA_SOCK        DEFMSG(CA_K_ERROR,      4)
00096 #define ECA_CONN        DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    5)
00097 #define ECA_ALLOCMEM    DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    6)
00098 #define ECA_UKNCHAN     DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    7)
00099 #define ECA_UKNFIELD    DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    8)
00100 #define ECA_TOLARGE     DEFMSG(CA_K_ERROR,      9)
00101 #define ECA_TIMEOUT     DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    10)
00102 #define ECA_NOSUPPORT   DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    11)
00103 #define ECA_STRTOBIG    DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    12)

00111 #define ECA_PUTFAIL     DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    20)

00115 #define ECA_DISCONN     DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    24)
00116 #define ECA_DBLCHNL     DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    25)
00117 #define ECA_EVDISALLOW  DEFMSG(CA_K_ERROR,      26)
00118 #define ECA_BUILDGET    DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    27)
00119 #define ECA_NEEDSFP     DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    28)
00120 #define ECA_OVEVFAIL    DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    29)
00121 #define ECA_BADMONID    DEFMSG(CA_K_ERROR,      30)
00122 #define ECA_NEWADDR     DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    31)
00123 #define ECA_NEWCONN     DEFMSG(CA_K_INFO,       32)
00124 #define ECA_NOCACTX     DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    33)
00125 #define ECA_DEFUNCT     DEFMSG(CA_K_FATAL,      34)
00126 #define ECA_EMPTYSTR    DEFMSG(CA_K_WARNING,    35)

00143 #define ECA_BADFUNCPTR   DEFMSG(CA_K_ERROR,     52)
